post.text: Unbelievable! Join me in NEVADA with the MOVEMENT! Nobody has ever seen anything like this before. Get out and VOTE on November 8th for #TrumpPence16! WE will MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN, TOGETHER!!

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: Round up gangs put them in the war against Americans if you come here you must join our army to fight for what we belive in no free ride no food stamps free housing or money
